title: I finally made it out of bronze :D
body: After many, many ranked games in my first season, I finally made it out of bronze... I never realized that I was hard stuck until I saw that I had almost 300 games. Bronze have been incredibly fun (and tilting) hopefully, I won't drop back to it anytime soon! Not much purpose for this post, I'm just real happy to finally make it out of bronze. Well that's all, I wish you all the best on your own climbing journey!
